title: App
description: An App represents an applications, command-line or otherwise.

lang.description: A short string representing the implementation language. Required for apps that need the `'#!{cmd}` shebang line modified before installing.

bin.description: A path pointing to the app binary, which may be generated by the build process.

doc.description: A path pointing to the documentation file for the app, which **SHOULD** be more than a README.

abstract.description: A short String value describing the extension.

lib.description: A path pointing a directory of additional files to install, such as support libraries or modules.

man.description: A path pointing to a man page or directory of man pages created by the build process.

html.description: A path pointing to an HTML file or directory of HTML files created by the build process.

examples.abstract: Check that all rows in a partition set are unique for the given columns
